doc.previous: Within the body of physical geography the Earth is often split into several spheres or environments the main spheres being the atmosphere biosphere cryosphere geosphere hydrosphere lithosphere and pedosphere Research in physical geography is often interdisciplinary and uses the systems approach
doc.after: Physical Geography can be divided into several sub fields as follows
